items.sentence: Could you do me a favor and babysit my kids tonight?
I don\'t know Tom well enough to ask him to do that.
I figured you wouldn\'t want Tom to know about this.
I can\'t leave yet. I still have a few things to do.
I can\'t let you drink by yourself. Let me join you.
I didn\'t feel very well, but I went to work anyway.
I didn\'t know that Tom could write Chinese so well.
Tom doesn\'t deserve the salary they\'re giving him.
Was your high school\'s basketball team a good team?
We all want to know why you weren\'t here yesterday.
